name: Mahi Tahi
description:
Play a small robot explorer and link to your teammate in order to solve puzzles and confront numerous enemies. Team up with your friend in this cooperative action-adventure game in 3D

Mahi Tahi is a game made during our second year at ICAN Paris.

Created by :

  • Steven BARRE - Concept Artist / 3D Modeler
  • Raphaël BOURGUEIL - Game Programmer / Game Designer / VFX Artist
  • Raphaël DEGRANGE - Game Designer / Game Programmer / Sound Designer / UI
  • Emilio GARCIA - Level Designer / Game Designer / 3D Modeler
  • Laurine LIETARD - Game Designer / Level Designer
